name: the one that wear no mask.
name_original: the one that wear no mask.
description:
the one that wear no mask. You wake up in a long-abandoned graveyard. A quest is given to you. You will have to reach Carcosa to complete your mission and finally meet your beloved king.

A little game prototype to test an idea out.

The story is built with elements from The King In Yellow  (Robert W. Chambers), but also from Haita The Shepherd and An Inhabitant of Carcosa (Ambrose Bierce). Quotes, from these different stories, are signified with "quotation marks"!

How to play?
  • Arrows - To move around
  • Alt - To Interact / Validate an option
